summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5798 for the improvement of West 49th Street, from 15th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; by widening pavement and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76423, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
